DataElement.preferredName: Patient Future Communication Specimen Consent Patient Ind-3
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown indicator whether a person consented to be contacted regarding future use of a specimen, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the consent of a person to be contacted regarding future use of a specimen, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: A time that is yet to come.:the exchange of information between objects, people, or groups.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: A time that is yet to come.
The exchange of information between objects, people, or groups.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient's initial consent given for further contact to participate in research on future studies

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patient's initial consent giv
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient's initial consent given for further contact regarding specimen?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Someone may contact me in the future to ask me to allow other uses of my specimens.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have you obtained the patient's consent for his or her doctor (or somone from the Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group) to contact him or her in the future to ask him or her to take part in more research?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Can we contact you in the future by mail, telephone or e-mail

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient consent to future contact about more research?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Someone from this institution may contact me in the future to ask me to take part in more research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient's initial consent given for further contact for future research

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Your study doctor (or someone he or she chooses) may contact you in the future to ask you to take part in more research

ReferenceDocuments.name: My doctor or someone from CALGB may contact me in the future to ask me to take part in more research
ReferenceDocuments.description: My doctor or someone from CALGB may contact me in the future to ask me to take part in more research

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient consented to allow an ACOSOG representative to contact patient in the future to take part in more research

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have you obtained the patient's consent for allow someone from this institution to contact him or her in the future to ask him or her to take part in more research

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given NCCTG or ABTC permission to be contacted in the future to take part in more research

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have you obtained the patient's consent to allow someone from this institution to contact him or her in the future to take part in more research

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have you obtained the patient's consent to allow someone from this institution to contact her in the future to take part in more research?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text17
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient consent to contact to take part in new studies?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text16
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given NCCTG permission to be contacted in the future to take part in more research

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text18
ReferenceDocuments.description: Someone from my hospital or CALGB may contact me in the future to ask me to take part in more research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Someone may contact me in the future to ask me to take part in more research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text19
ReferenceDocuments.description: Someone from my hospital or [insert Cooperative Group name] may contact me in the future to ask me to take part in more research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG CRF 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Someone from ECOG-ACRIN may contact the patient in the future to ask the patient to take part in more research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 22
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to be contacted by or have their physician contacted by the study doctor or their representative to learn about results from this study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF TEXT 21
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to be contacted by or have their physician contacted by the study doctor or their representative to learn about results from these studies?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF_Text_20
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient consented to contact regarding participation in other research in the future?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 23
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient agree for their study doctor or their representative to contact themselves or their physician to see if the patient wishes to participate in other research in the future

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 24
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient agree to allow the study doctor, or their representative, to contact them or their physician to see if they wish to participate in other research in the future?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 25
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient agree to allow the study doctor, or someone on the study team, to contact them to see if they wish to participate in other research in the future?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 26
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the participant agree that their study doctor, or someone on the study team, may contact them or their doctor to see if they wish to participate in other research in the future?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient agree that their study doctor, or someone on the study team, may contact them or their doctor to see if they wish to participate in other research in the future?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient agree to allow the study doctor, or someone on the study team, to contact them or their doctor to see if they wish to participate in other research in the future?
